name: riscv-sim
description: CPU Visualisation based on a risc-v processor in verilog

scripts.?start: echo Start electron locally with angular beeing served and watched
scripts.electron:serve: npm run electron:tsc && npm run simworker:build && wait-on http-get://localhost:4200/ && electron . --serve --enable-logging --verbose
scripts.build: npm run electron:tsc && npm run simworker:build && ng build --base-href ./
scripts.?build:simlib_binding:local: echo Generates ts, cpp bindings between electron and the simulation_library. Requires cmake and python3.
scripts.build:simlib_binding:local: cd ./simulation_library && cmake . -G"Unix Makefiles" && make GenerateBinding && cd ..
scripts.?build:simlib:local: echo Compile the simlib simulation_library. Requires cmake and gcc to be installed.
scripts.build:simlib:local: npm run build:simlib:clean && cmake -S./simulation_library -G"Unix Makefiles" -B./simulation_library && make -C ./simulation_library Vtestbench
scripts.?build:simlib:windows_docker: echo Compile the simlib simulation_library for windows with a docker image. Requires docker.
scripts.build:simlib:windows_docker: npm run build:simlib:clean && docker run --rm dockcross/windows-static-x64 > ./dockcross-windows-static-x64 && chmod +x ./dockcross-windows-static-x64 && ./dockcross-windows-static-x64 cmake -S./simulation_library -G"Unix Makefiles" -B./simulation_library && ./dockcross-windows-static-x64 make -C ./simulation_library Vtestbench
scripts.?build:simlib:linux_docker: echo Compile the simlib simulation_library for linux with a docker image. Requires docker.
scripts.build:simlib:linux_docker: npm run build:simlib:clean && docker run --rm dockcross/linux-x64 > ./dockcross-linux-x64 && chmod +x ./dockcross-linux-x64 && ./dockcross-linux-x64 cmake -S./simulation_library -G"Unix Makefiles" -B./simulation_library && ./dockcross-linux-x64 make -C ./simulation_library Vtestbench
scripts.?build:simlib:clean: echo Clean the CMakeFiles of the simulation_library.
